custom-name: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb - GOG
files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_23_build.rar
- multi5: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/ijet_multi5.tar.xz
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/gamepad%20profiles/ijet_gamepad_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/gamepad%20profiles/ijet_gamepad_steam.sccprofile
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/gamepad%20profiles/ijet_gamepad_readme.html
- menu: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/ijet.bat
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Emperor's%20Tomb/ijet.bmp
- inno: https://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/innoextract-1.9/innoextract-1.9-linux.tar.xz
- gogsetup: N/A:Please select the game setup Windows exe file downloaded from your
    GOG account.
- videos: N/A:Please select the IJET "Movies, Loading screens fix (Full Screen 1280x960)"
    archive available for download at https://www.moddb.com/mods/moviesloading-screens-fix-full-screen-1280x960/downloads/movies-loading-screens-fix-full-screen-1280x960
game:
  arch: win64
  args: c:\\ijet.bat
  exe: drive_c/windows/syswow64/wineconsole.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games" --gog "$gogsetup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 0
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        fakec0: None
        faked0: None
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673251369
        flagg0: 1207959634
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 136347652
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 16384
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 0
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 0
        initresw0: 0
        initts0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb\GameData\bin\indy.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        module0: None
        monitorid0: -1
        notes0: None
        opengllib0: None
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb\GameData\bin\indy.exe
        posx0: 0
        posy0: 0
        registry0: None
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 0
        sizy0: 0
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\GOG Games\Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb\GameData\bin\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
      window:
        exepath: C:\GOG Games\Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb\GameData\bin\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\dxwnd\exports\
        posx: 1578
        posy: 633
        sizx: 320
        sizy: 200
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app/GameData/indy
    file: videos
    format: rar
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app/gamepad profiles
    src: gppsteam
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app/gamepad profiles
    src: gppx360
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app/gamepad profiles
    src: gppreadme
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c
    src: menu
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c
    src: wpp
- task:
    app: vcrun6
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: msvcrt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\ijet.bmp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 255 128 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    format: txz
    src: multi5
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your preferred game''s language for menus and subtitles:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - keep: Keep the default language from the downloaded installer
    - fr: French
    - es: Spanish
    - it: Italian
    - de: German
    - ru: Russian
    preselect: keep
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games"; mv app "Indiana Jones and the Emperor's
      Tomb"; cd "Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb"; rm -f -r ../tmp __support
      GameuxInstallHelper.dll  goggame-1425034773.* webcache.zip; if [ $INPUT_LANG
      != "keep" ];  then echo "language choisi " $INPUT_LANG; cp -f -r "$CACHE/"$INPUT_LANG/gameinfo/
      GameData/indy; else echo "keep" ; fi;
- write_file:
    content: 'fpsLimit=60

      res_width=1280

      res_height=960

      res_bpp=32

      subtitles=true'
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb/GameData/indy/vars.cfg
wine:
  Desktop: true
